entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 25 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
